summary: Master's student in Software Quality with hands-on experience in Java, Spring Boot, and microservices. Focused on building scalable, maintainable systems with attention to performance and code quality.

experience.description: Built a web application for integrated service and product marketing, improving business processes and enhancing user experience.
Unified authentication across microservices via the API Gateway and coordinated code reviews to accelerate deployment.
Analyzed and fixed bugs in an existing desktop application developed in VB.NET, resulting in improved stability and performance.
Developed a web application for the digital management of correspondence between the Doctoral Studies Center (CED) and the DECANAT's office.

education.institution: FSDM - Sidi Mohamed Ben Abdellah University, Fez

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering and Digital Governance
Higher Technician's Diploma in Information Systems Development

projects.title: Java Code Analysis Tool
projects.description: Developed a Java code analysis tool to extract project structure and generate UML diagrams, improving project documentation and design understanding.

projects.title: BTS Institutions Management Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a web platform to manage BTS institutions and logbooks, reducing manual tracking and improving data accuracy.

projects.title: SmartFind Web Platform
projects.description: As part of the SmartFind project (Injaz Al Maghrib program), developed the promotional website for the mobile solution. Built a modern, responsive, and user-friendly interface showcasing key features: intelligent search (image, keywords, dynamic filters), immersive virtual tour, and support for local merchants. Contributed to the design and integration of sections (presentation, vision, leadership team, contact form).

projects.title: CV Management Application
projects.description: Designed and developed a web application for creating, editing, and managing CVs with an intuitive and responsive interface.

projects.title: Google Chrome Extension
projects.description: Developed a Chrome extension integrating an embedded AI model (without reliance on cloud solutions like Gemini Nano) to assist users in filling out long and complex forms.
